content: this is a fun afghan square will look great as part of a sampler afghan or on its own intermediate level with a few post stitches and overlay crochet techniques have fun with colors this is a featured design in the 2025 moogly block cal - see moogly com for all the free patterns and check out the facebook moogly cal group for inspiration pattern free on my blog http //julieyeagerdesigns com check out videos in my youtube channel 1 pattern support at the julie yeager designs board on ravelry 1 https //www youtube com/channel/uccl7mktkebwjn40qwmepw5g/
